content: a cute succulent plant is a staple of the modern workspace grab a skein of green yarn from your stash and crochet one for yourself please note that the green yarn i used rustic romantic window ivy is discontinued any #4 yarn will work fine - - - - - - - this pattern is part of the yarn + chai #yarnstashchallenge to learn more go to https //yarnandchai com/yarnstashchallenge
